Class QuickFindSizeNode<D>

java.lang.Object
datastructure.unionfind.QuickFindNode<D>
datastructure.unionfind.QuickFindSizeNode<D>
Type Parameters:
D - type of the data object
All Implemented Interfaces:
UnionFindNode<D>
public class QuickFindSizeNode<D> extends QuickFindNode<D>
Implementation of the node of a generic Union Find data structure containing data objects based on the Quick Find implementation with heuristic on the size. The node simply adds to the standard QuickFindNode a field used to store inside the head of a list, i.e. the representative of the corresponding set, the size of the list.
